title: What are the borders for around my champ icons?
body: http://imgur.com/gallery/g04gO What are these borders for around my champ icon, and what are they for?

replies.body: The gold borders in your profile mark champions you've earned mastery chests with!  More information on mastery chests can also be found in our [hextech crafting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)guide.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Weird. I got the gold borders for champs I rarely play and highest ranks were A with them
